message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you a decent amount to get us started.

I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. But I need a bit more to make it worth my while.
I'm starting to get a bit impatient, Alice. You're not making it easy for me to accept your offers. But I'm still willing to negotiate.
I'm not backing down, Bob. I think I deserve a bigger share, considering the value of the money is decreasing every round.

I'm not giving up yet, Alice. I think I can make a better offer that will get us closer to a deal. But I'm running out of patience.
